```{r}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
simulation_results <- fread('./report/simulation0.csv')
```

```{r}
research_data = simulation_results %>%
  filter(Step == 0) %>%
  select(AgentID, Neighbors_number, network_type, Influencer)
```

```{r}
research_data.random.non_inf = research_data %>%
  filter(network_type == 'random', Influencer == 'TRUE')
research_data.smallworld.non_inf = research_data %>%
  filter(network_type == 'small_world', Influencer == 'TRUE')
```

```{r}
research_data.random.non_inf.mean = min(research_data.random.non_inf$Neighbors_number)
research_data.smallworld.non_inf.mean = min(research_data.smallworld.non_inf$Neighbors_number)
```
